text: "New York City" is a song by American DJ duo The Chainsmokers from the duo's first EP Bouquet. It features uncredited vocals from American singer Victoria Zaro. The song peaked at number 25 on the US Dance/Electronic Songs chart and number 80 on the 2016 Dance/Electronic Songs year-end chart. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- !scope="col"|Chart (2015–16) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !scope="col"|Chart (2016) !scope="col"|Position |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) | 80 |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Ref. |- ! scope="row"| Various | October 23, 2015 | Digital download | rowspan="2"| | |- ! scope="row"| United States | October 30, 2015 | Top 40 radio | |- |} ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:The Chainsmokers songs Category:Songs written by Andrew Taggart Category:Disruptor Records singles
title: New York City (The Chainsmokers song)
